mapper.select: SELECT a.club_code, a.club_name, a.club_cost, a.club_loc, a.club_intro, a.club_signtype, a.club_memtot, a.club_pic, a.ctmid_code FROM CLUB a ,CATEGORYMIDDLE b WHERE a.ctmid_code = b.ctmid_code order by a.club_code desc

SELECT a.club_code, a.club_name, a.club_cost, a.club_loc, a.club_intro, a.club_signtype, a.club_memtot, a.club_pic, a.ctmid_code FROM CLUB a ,CATEGORYMIDDLE b WHERE a.ctmid_code = b.ctmid_code AND b.ctmid_name = #{ctmid_name} order by a.club_code desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB (club_code, club_name, club_cost, club_loc, club_intro, club_signtype, club_memtot, club_pic, ctmid_code) VALUES(seq_club_code.nextval, ${club_name}, ${club_cost}, ${club_loc}, ${club_intro}, ${club_signtype}, ${club_memtot}, ${club_pic}, ${ctmid_code})
